name: Only lone way
description:
Play with a magic sword and follow his journey !

You can see a wonderful galaxy place and fight some Elementos. With your sword you can possess and also slay them ! 

Welcome to Only Lone Way, the only good way of slay. 

Controls

Keyboard (azerty)

  • ZQSD: movement
  • Space bar: jump
  • Mouse: camera
  • Left Click: dash attack (this dash can kill ennemy but can't give you more speed)
  • Rigth Click: throw the sword
  • Shift: dash (low distance but this grant you whit more speed)
  • Ctrl: Hulk smash (down smash that can break a specifique platform and give you a little bit of speed)
  • Escape: Pause menu

Team

Game Designers : Julien Blondelot & Matéo le Breton & Teliau Simon Troalen.

Game Artists : Aida Menheim & Floriane Schulz.

Game Programmers : Léandro Benites & Enguerrand Cousin.

Sound Designer : Matéo le Breton.
